name: Whey Protein Isolate
desc: Whey Protein Isolate consists of at least 85% protein and contains less than 1% lactose – which can be a huge advantage for people with intolerance to this ingredient. In addition, the product is low in sodium and low in lipids. Despite the purification process, Whey Protein Isolate still retains high levels of calcium and amino acids. Whey Protein Isolate allows for fortification of protein content and low fat levels.
techs: Our great team of Sales Support will help our Traders conduct the contract and business deals in a smooth and efficient way to ensure the best quality service to all our Business Partners. Our logistics team will take care of transportation and the financial department will be responsible for all matters connected with the financial part of the deal.
shelf: The shelf life of Whey Protein Isolate (WPI) is 18 months. The product should be stored in a dry, clean warehouse with a max. temperature of 25°C and relative humidity max. 75%.
packaging: Foodcom supplies its Business Partners with Whey Protein Isolate (WPI) in 15 or 25 kg bags.
applications: Whey Protein Isolate is a commonly used component of sport nutrition products including protein supplements, protein shakes, snack bars, and clear sports drinks, that supports muscle growth. It is also used in dietary goods due to very low levels of carbs and fat. Furthermore, its high amino acid content makes it a perfect ingredient for baby foods. Other applications for Whey Protein Isolate include the general production of deserts, creams, yogurts, puddings, soups, dry mixes, sauces, confectionery products, ice creams, meats, and sausages.
